tool_description: Laptop database API that contains both specs and images of most laptops. Updated on daily basis.
name: LaptopDB
title: LaptopDB

api_list.name: companies
api_list.description: List of all available companies that can be used in /laptop/search ?company filter
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://laptopdb1.p.rapidapi.com/companies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "laptopdb1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://laptopdb1.p.rapidapi.com/companies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "laptopdb1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: gpu/search
api_list.description: Lets you search gpus by name

api_list.name: cpu/search
api_list.description: Lets you search cpus by name

api_list.name: laptop/search
api_list.description: Lets you search laptops by specs or name

optional_parameters.name: inches
optional_parameters.description: Example: 10.1,11.6,12, etc.. You can also send multiple comma separated.

optional_parameters.name: cpu
optional_parameters.description: It can be simple like i3 or i9, but also an specific integer.

optional_parameters.name: gpu
optional_parameters.description: GPU id that can be obtained using gpu/search call. Ex: 11 (Nvidia 1080 GTX)
